description: JavaScript source code defining a jQuery plugin for a crossword puzzle, including initialization, coordinate calculation, table building, answer checking, and navigation logic.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the crossword puzzle, sets up event handlers, and builds the puzzle table and entries.

methods.name: calcCoords
methods.description: Calculates all coordinates for puzzle entries based on starting positions and orientations.

methods.name: buildTable
methods.description: Builds the HTML table structure for the crossword grid.

methods.name: buildEntries
methods.description: Creates input elements within grid cells for each puzzle entry and labels them.

methods.name: checkAnswer
methods.description: Checks if the current input group matches the correct answer and updates the puzzle state.
